name: The Destroyer of D
text: Can be used from your 4th turn and oward, when you have 3000 or less Life Points. Play 1 "Destiny HERO - Dark Angel" from your hand to your opponent's field in Defense Position. If your opponent controls a "Destiny HERO - Plasma" you can place "Destiny HERO - Dark Angel" on top of your opponent's Deck instead. This Skill will not activate if you begin the Duel with a Deck that contains monsters other than "Destiny HERO" monsters. This Skill can only be used once per Duel.
